name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in developing high-performance solutions utilizing **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **NestJS** within microservices and event-driven architectures. My strong skill set includes designing **RESTful APIs**, implementing **CQRS**, and utilizing **DDD** principles to enhance application scalability and maintainability. Proficient in asynchronous event-based communication and SQL, I leverage technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Tailwind CSS** to create dynamic user interfaces, employing state management techniques like **React Query** and the **Context API**.
Additionally, I employ **Docker** for containerization and CI/CD processes to streamline deployment workflows. My expertise further extends to monitoring and logging using **Prometheus** and **Splunk**, alongside advanced communication protocols like **gRPC** and **Protocol Buffers**. I possess a solid foundation in leading enterprise-grade platforms compliant with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring robust security and data integrity. Skilled in integrating AI/ML capabilities, I have hands-on experience in building machine learning pipelines, serving models in production, and implementing MLOps workflows.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained scalable full-stack applications using **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **React** (17-18), ensuring robust performance and responsiveness across diverse platforms.
Architected microservices-based solutions following **DDD** principles, integrating **RESTful APIs** and utilizing **asynchronous event-based communication** for enhanced scalability and maintainability.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines leveraging tools such as **Docker**, ensuring efficient deployment and management of applications across environments, with automated testing and monitoring capabilities.
Designed user interfaces using **Next.js** and **Tailwind CSS**, promoting seamless UX and performance optimizations, achieving a **30% increase in load speeds** over previous iterations.
Created and deployed complex event-driven architectures utilizing **NestJS** and **gRPC**, optimizing communication between microservices and external APIs, enhancing system reliability and efficiency.
Engaged in collaborative feature development with cross-functional teams, effectively managing state within applications using **React Query** and **Context API** to ensure data consistency and improve user experience.
Led initiatives in transforming legacy systems into modern architectures, utilizing **Docker** and **microservices** patterns to facilitate fault tolerance and streamline service delivery.
Ensured high standards of code quality and performance through unit, integration, and end-to-end testing practices using industry-standard frameworks including **Jest** and **Cypress**.
Monitored system performance and health metrics using **Prometheus** and **Splunk**, enabling proactive resolution of bottlenecks and other critical issues in production systems.
Collaborated with data engineers and other stakeholders to implement **SQL** derived analytics, enhancing data insights and driving decision-making processes across departments.

• Developed and modernized financial platforms utilizing a **microservices** architecture with **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and throughput for high-volume transaction systems, processing up to **10,000 transactions per second**.
• Crafted dynamic, user-centric front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver responsive UI for financial dashboards with speeds of under **200ms** for data loading.
• Designed and implemented real-time transaction monitoring dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to detect anomalies and generate insights, significantly reducing alert response times by **30%**.
• Established a robust **event-driven architecture** by integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, facilitating asynchronous communication for transaction alerts and compliance workflows, improving processing efficiency by **50%**.
• Architected and orchestrated ETL pipelines employing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for batch and real-time financial data ingestion, handling over **100TB** of data monthly from various sources.
• Deployed AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns to mitigate fraud risk by **25%** in banking systems.
• Developed ML pipelines for credit scoring and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference into backend services for real-time decision-making, achieving model prediction latency under **50ms**.

• Developed scalable **microservices** using **Node.js** (NestJS) and **TypeScript**, ensuring adherence to **RESTful APIs** standards while employing **CQRS** and **DDD** methodologies for efficient data processing in a high-demand environment.
• Engineered responsive frontend applications utilizing **React** (version 18) and **Next.js**, implementing **state management** strategies through **React Query** and **Context API** to enhance user interactions and reduce load times by **30%**.
• Implemented **event-driven architectures** using **asynchronous event-based communication** facilitated by Kafka and RabbitMQ, allowing for real-time order updates and robust inventory tracking systems.
• Optimized backend services to ensure high availability and performance metrics, supporting up to **50,000** concurrent users across checkout and order fulfillment modules.
• Utilized **Docker** for containerization and established CI/CD pipelines from development to production, enhancing deployment frequency by **40%** and reducing rollbacks through controlled release strategies.
• Integrated state-of-the-art monitoring tools like **Prometheus** and **Splunk** to ensure application health and performance tracking, achieving an uptime of **99.9%** on critical services.
• Developed visually appealing, SEO-friendly UIs in collaboration with design teams, applying **Tailwind CSS** and ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
• Built secure microservices architecture with **gRPC** and **Protocol Buffers** for efficient inter-service communication, underpinned by well-defined contracts and versioning.
• Created dynamic feature flags and blue-green deployments in coordination with LaunchDarkly and Kubernetes, allowing real-time A/B testing and minimizing risks during high-stakes updates.
• Enhanced system resilience through the application of role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring adherence to GDPR and safeguarding user data across the platform.
